post.body: You are awesome. That is all.
I will keep my fingers crossed that Lulu will get hungry and thirsty and come home. Cats are pretty self-sufficient...
Own the fear, friend.
Ha! Training is everything. Too bad neither one of us is very trainable at this point. But we are appreciative.
Aaww, thanks. I was wondering about your cat and your son. How's it going?
LOL absolutely. I'm lucky, I've got a good one. He is just frustrated right now.
I will. Thanks. I am still meaning to buy your book! Honestly.
We are both lucky we are living now. Can you imagine? Yikes! Thanks for reading.
Why so many replacements?
Oh holy cow. I am always surpised when people think I am positive all the time. Obviously no listening devices in my home.
I'm sobbing into my MBP. The spot is gone, so hopefully my apology was accepted.
Ours is too. The decorating is the fun part.
LOL I should have made him stick to exoskeletal bugs only. Wait, is that a boner joke? ha!
I hate the censorship. It doesn't work. The Boy was young, I did parental controls, he couldn't access U of CO insect site!
You know, I keep thinking about you going thru all that husbandless and kind of suddenly. If I was nearby I'd shovel some.
I think one of his investors killed himself, not Madoff.
Good thing she warned you. eewww
LOL I stand corrected. Seriously. LMAO
Um. You forgot to say jackass (Rush).
Isn't it funny though?
Absolutely.
Aww, thanks! You are awesome.
Maybe if you weren't wearing that damned burka when you said it...
Umm...I mean: Thank you, sir.
Oh jeez. Are you teasing me?
Just keep going. Ignore that inner editor. Or as I call it, my inner mother.
Then you hafta keep going! Maybe it is saleable, and your inner editor is a big fat liar. I can't write fiction. I'm envious.
Hahaha It is so weird and interesting what people do in their sleep. Other than sleeping.
Tonight's post: Freaking Out. http://biggreybirds.wordpress.com
Just did the math. Everytime I write a blog post, I write about 60 words per reader. That's right, isn't it? <YMMV>
Why does Kevin Bacon's hair always look like it is attacking his head?
My dog just put his chuckhole on my laptop screen and made a foggy spot. OMG!
Whenever I see a Gordon Ramsey ad now, I imagine @bsheepies sobbing.
Search "why earth is a big gravity" and you will get to a blog called Big Grey Birds. But you still won't know "why earth is a big gravity".
Hubby came home with Gourdy 2 hrs late with cheesecake, mixed nuts and a flat screen TV with DVD player. How about that?!
I wonder just how much coffee I need to drink to get back out there and shovel some more?
Wow, the FedEx man must really hate snow. Or maybe when he was hired as a driver they didn't tell him he would have to get out of the truck.
Travelers going through O'Hare will have free live music and free gift wrapping. We may go over there for Christmas. Better than our plans.
Live in area of lawn guys/snoblowers; love reaction when I shovel snow: Cars slow, occupants stare. What is the strange ritual she performs?
Blog post today: Updates. http://biggreybirds.wordpress.com/
